values: Doctrine Fails Without Delight: The Mind as Servant of the HeartDoctrine Fails Without Delight: The Mind as Servant of the Heart

By God’s design, truth serves emotion. Thinking serves feeling. The lyrics of our best songs serve the Godward longings of our hearts.By God’s design, truth serves emotion. Thinking serves feeling. The lyrics of our best songs serve the Godward longings of our hearts.
